constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 125 (Friday, July 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KHANNA:
H.R. 4461.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
21st Century Jobs Act
Article 1, Section 8 of the Constitution gives Congress the
power to make laws that are necessary and proper to carry out
its enumerated powers.
[Page H3633]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Climate Change.

title: 21st Century Jobs Act
